creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: all have flat areas behind shoulders & hips; .1-6 all have hands held to ears, .1 wearing red jacket; .2ab wearing yellow jacket; .3 wearing brown jacket; .4 wearing brown jacket; .5 wearing blue jacket; .6 wearing light blue robe that ties at waist; .7 wearing green jacket, has PR arm raised to hear, PL arm covering mouth
title: Monkey, one of seven
